meanings.definition: A person who is admitted or allowed entry into a place or organization.
meanings.sent1: The admittee was happy to join the club.
meanings.sent2: The school welcomed the new admittee with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The admittee accidentally walked into the wrong meeting room, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an admittee into the world of magic when she entered the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent5: Becoming an admittee felt like stepping into a whole new world of opportunities.

meanings.definition: The individual who is granted admission or acceptance into a program or institution.
meanings.sent1: Every admittee must follow the rules of the university.
meanings.sent2: The admittee received a scholarship for their academic achievements.
meanings.sent3: The admittee's acceptance letter got lost in the mail, leading to a comical situation.
meanings.sent4: She was the admittee to the prestigious art school, painting her future with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Becoming an admittee to the exclusive club felt like winning a golden ticket.
